controller.musicplayer

Class ClassicMusicPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.UpdatableObserversManager
      • controller.AbstractBasicPlayer
        • controller.musicplayer.AbstractMusicPlayer
          • controller.musicplayer.ClassicMusicPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MusicPlayer, PlaylistFeatureCommand, Observable, Player
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoopableMusicPlayer

    public class ClassicMusicPlayer
extends AbstractMusicPlayer
implements PlaylistFeatureCommand
    A classic music player is a normal music player that at the end of the song goes to the next This class use the basic implementation of a music player defined in the abstract class AbstractMusicPlayer and implements the method of the interface PlaylistFeatureCommand
    Author:
    Matteo Gabellini
